entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Greenstone (Geraldton)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:32 a.m. EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow mixed with freezing rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or freezing rain. Local blowing snow this morning. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:49 AM EDT Friday 21 April 2023
